content.text:
# Sacramento Kings draft history

This is a list of draft picks by the Sacramento Kings of the NBA. In total, the Kings have had 514 draft picks.
Key
{| class="wikitable"
|bgcolor="#FFCCCC"|Naismith Basketball Hall of Famer
|bgcolor="#CCFFCC"|First overall NBA draft pick
|bgcolor="FFCC00"|Selected for an NBA All-Star Game
|}
NBA Draft picks
Oscar Robertson, the first pick in the 1960 NBA draft, is one of only three players in NBA history to average a triple-double for a season. He was also the MVP of the 1963â€“64 NBA season.]]
